channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AT&T’s Connected Life Platform Is a Second Try in the Smart-Home Space
item.description: The carrier’s Connected Life platform, now available nationwide, lets AT&T customers easily set up a smart-home security system.

item.title: OpenAI fires back at Google with GPT-5.2 after ‘code red’ memo
item.description: OpenAI just launched GPT-5.2, a frontier model aimed at developers and professionals, pushing reasoning and coding benchmarks as it races Google’s Gem...

item.title: Epic Games’ Fortnite is back in US Google Play Store, as court partially reverses restrictions it won on iOS
item.description: The game is back on the Google Play Store, but another court decision is rolling back some of the developer-friendly changes on iOS.

item.title: 6 Best Smart Christmas Lights (2025): Twinkly, Govee, Cync
item.description: Control these smart lights with a voice command or a tap on your phone. Now that’s a Christmas miracle.

item.title: Disney hits Google with cease-and-desist claiming ‘massive’ copyright infringement
item.description: Disney is accusing the tech giant of unauthorized distribution of its copyrighted characters without permission via Gemini AI.

item.title: Disney signs deal with OpenAI to allow Sora to generate AI videos featuring its characters
item.description: Disney says that alongside the agreement, it will "become a major customer of OpenAI," as it will use its APIs to build new products, tools, and exper...

item.title: On Me raises $6M to shake up the gift card industry
item.description: On Me raises $6 million for its digital gift card platform that lets users purchase cards categorized by interests rather than being restricted to spe...

item.title: Google’s AI try-on feature for clothes now works with just a selfie
item.description: In the past, users had to upload a full-body picture of themselves to virtually try on a piece of clothing. Now they can use a selfie and Nano Banana ...

item.title: The market has ‘switched’ and founders have the power now, VCs say
item.description: Graham & Walker’s Leslie Feinzaig and XYZ Venture’s Ross Fubini share the secrets for founders — and VCs — to make the most of the current fast pace o...

item.title: TIME names ‘Architects of AI’ its Person of the Year
item.description: TIME Magazine has named the 'Architects of AI' its Person of the Year, who include Jensen Huang, Elon Musk, Sam Altman, Mark Zuckerberg, Lisa Su, Dari...
